characters: Driver of a white sedan, Driver of a white car
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a highway in foggy conditions. The self-driving vehicle is following a white sedan closely. At 3.7s, the white sedan in front slows down and stops, causing the self-driving vehicle to decelerate. At 7.5s, another white car from the right lane cuts into the self-driving vehicles lane abruptly, forcing the self-driving vehicle to brake suddenly.
actions: The self-driving vehicle decelerates gradually as the white sedan in front slows down and stops. At 7.5s, the self-driving vehicle brakes suddenly due to the white car cutting in from the right lane.
key_objects: 1) Front: A white sedan, approximately 5 meters away, slowing down and stopping. 2) Right: A white car, approximately 2 meters away, cutting into the self-driving vehicles lane abruptly.
